column1: Smoque BBQ////But when I took a bite of my long-awaited brisket
column2: my BBQ dreams deflated a bit. Though the meat was incredibly juicy
column3: I found the brisket to be lacking in spice
column4: even with the sauce on top. It tasted a lot like the kind of brisket you would have with your Passover meal (not a bad thing
column5: but I was expecting more spice).
